p: In the case of TSA agar plates supplemented with 0.1 v/ v% Tween 20 detergent, MQF showed inhibition on B. subtilis, S. epidermidis, and E. coli AG 100 A. MQL was active against B. subtilis, E. coli AG 100, and E. coli AG 100 A while MQS was only active against E. coli AG 100 A. However, P. aeruginosa and E. coli AG 100 were resistant to all tested essential oils ( Table 4).
